Elements.Body: You should get your friends together so that we can talk about how to handle the Nightmares. I know you kids have a lot going on right now, and you need to focus on yourselves, but that’s exactly why we need more people involved.
Anyone joining us is going to have a lot on their plate.
I don’t disagree that we need more people, but don’t you think we ought to pick who?

But I don’t believe there’s any reason you and your friends need to be the ones in charge of this nonsense. Your future and your health should be your priority. If we make this open to everyone, whatever organization is needed for this to come together will form by itself.

But I don’t believe there’s any reason you and your friends need to be the ones in charge of this nonsense. Your future and your health should be your priority. If we make this open to everyone, whatever organization is needed for this to come together will form by itself.
This has everything to do with our health and our future.
Do you really think that people are responsible enough?

Anyone who has seen what we have will feel compelled to make a change. Anyone who’s lost someone since all this started will want to find out how to solve this whole mess. We aren’t the heroes of this you have to understand that.

Anyone who has seen what we have will feel compelled to make a change. Anyone who’s lost someone since all this started will want to find out how to solve this whole mess. We aren’t the heroes of this you have to understand that.
If we can’t be heroes, then no one else can be one either. We’ll talk about this later.
I just hope you’re right. Let’s talk more about this later.
